document_data.mainbody:
Dualah was a female human cleric of Umberlee in Hillsfar in 1367 DR.
Lord Maalthiir seemed interested in her However, Dualah was a follower of Mordak Brelliar, Maalthiirs apprentice, who tried to use this to his advantage, to gain information on Maalthiir. Dualah knew nothing about these plots.
